title: Who’s on the Throne?
verse_text: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
insight: If God is not first, He’s last.
The throne of your life doesn’t have room for two.
one_minute_win: Pray this line aloud: 'King Jesus, take the throne of my heart today.'
declaration: God’s kingdom comes first, everything else follows.
related_devotionals: Joshua 24:15 Devotional - As for Me and My House
Colossians 3:2 Devotional - Set Your Mind on Things Above
